data: It is now five years since Philip Clay and I were given up by the world as lost, five years since we plunged into that appalling adventure from which, even today, we have barely begun to recover.
Coblentz, Stanton A. (Stanton Arthur), 1896-1982; Paul, Frank R. (Frank Rudolph), 1884-1963 [Illustrator]
